BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISCMM_PO_MET_EXP_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID,STR_PO_ORDER_NO, DT_PO_ORDER_DATE, STR_TYPE_OF_BILL, STR_SUBJECT, STR_ITEM_NAME, NUM_QTY, NUM_AMOUNT, STR_REMARKS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,IS_EXP_REQD,NUM_PO_AMOUNT) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISCMM_BILL_GEN_TRN T SET T.STR_BILL_STATUS =? WHERE T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PISCMM_PO_MET_EXP_DTL A WHERE A.STR_PO_ORDER_NO=?
DELETE FROM PISCMM_PO_MET_EXP_DTL A WHERE A.STR_PO_ORDER_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISCMM_PO_MET_EXP_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_PO_ORDER_NO, DT_PO_ORDER_DATE, STR_TYPE_OF_BILL, STR_SUBJECT, STR_ITEM_NAME, NUM_QTY, NUM_AMOUNT, STR_REMARKS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,IS_EXP_REQD,STR_MEETING_ID,NUM_PO_AMOUNT) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISCMM_PO_MET_EXP_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCMM_BILL_GEN_TRN T SET T.STR_BILL_STATUS =? WHERE T.STR_PO_ORDER_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
